Text: Please explain why this one is better or different from the standard one Google supplies ?
So far the only difference i see is the new look and more choices in settings. Nothing really big
@ pythonista99  it probably don't check for lic # verification
Cool.  Always appreciate the choices.  This is quite a critical app on a phone, and anything malicious here could cause BIG trouble  :-)

I think I saw on XDA that a new Play Store had been released. I do not however think that this has the license verification patch pre-installed. You can try the other torrent here and see if it can patch this version of the store, but as I have multiple apps that check for licenses I'm gunna stick with default until I know for sure...

I do like the look of the layout though.
